name: logindesignerwp
description: Login Designer WP - Custom Login Page Designer for WordPress

scripts.build:js: terser assets/js/admin.js -o assets/js/admin.min.js --compress --mangle && terser assets/js/wizard.js -o assets/js/wizard.min.js --compress --mangle
scripts.build:css: csso assets/css/admin.css -o assets/css/admin.min.css && csso assets/css/wizard.css -o assets/css/wizard.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css

author: Sterling Chase
